Name: Relax Fly
About the game: Man has always aspired to the sky, dreaming in all the milestones of history to soar like a bird. Always his eyes hovered somewhere in the clouds, searching for the very wings that would lift him from the mortal earth, full of bitterness and hardships. And always, when this glance caught the birds, the viewer feels admiration for the carelessness and lightness of the winged ones, not without longing and envy, of course. We present you Relax Fly-a bird simulator runner that offers you to feel these very wings, to become a bird, though not really, but at least virtually! Feel the cold wind in the vicinity of a snow-covered mountain village and feel this very freedom, weightlessness and wind in feathers, which is not given to feel any person on the whole planet! Features and benefits of the game: - Atmospheric location - Nice graphics - Suitable for all ages - Check the reaction
